title: 85/541/EEC: Commission Decision of 3 December 1985 approving the third amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by Italy (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 3 December 1985
approving the third amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by Italy
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(85/541/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The third amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by Italy, is hereby approved.
The amendment of the plan referred to in Article 1 shall take effect on 1 January 1986.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 December 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
